Public goods, clay mask

Brand: Public Goods

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Kaolin, Bentonite, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Charcoal Powder, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Allantoin, Magnesium

llantoin, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid

Directions: Apply an even layer to clean, dry skin. Avoid eyes and lips. Leave on for 15-20 minutes then gently rinse off with cool water.

Caution: Avoid getting product into the

ing product into the eyes, nose, mouth, or broken skin. Discontinue use if irritation or sensitivity occurs.

Warnings: Avoid getting product into the eyes, nose, mouth, or broken skin. Discontinue use if irritation or sensitivity occurs.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reprod
